      • growActionERTEnsemble

        public ActionERTEnsemble growActionERTEnsemble(int k,
                                      int treesInEnsemble,
                                      int nMin,
                                      Action act)
        Grows an ActionERTEnsemble.
        Parameters:
        k - k number of splits to create at each inner node. If k is null, then sqrt(number of attribute) will be used.
        treesInEnsemble - Number of trees in ensemble.
        nMin - nMin a leaf is created if |set| <= n_min.
        act - Action associated with this action ensemble.
        Returns:
